Today in County Clare, it's looking fun with 3 ft @ 12s WNW swell and light 6 mph NNE winds. Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left are great picks, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @ 10s WNW with light winds, making it a quiet day for surf. On the day after, conditions improve again with 4 ft @ 12s WNW swell and moderate 11 mph NE winds, perfect for a solid session at spots like Doolin Point and Lahinch. Best: today.
